name: Magnetron Pinball 2D
description:
Magnetron Pinball is a fast action 2D pinball game using physics to simulate real pinball action.

I am developing a pinball sandbox for people to design their own pinball layouts so any donation will help to keep this project progressing.

Arrow keys for left and right flipper

Down Arrow sends ball

Touch controls on side of game for flippers.

Touch and tap down arrow to set and send ball

Enjoy!
